description: Intimate moments are uninterrupted, and both partners ‚Äî especially women ‚Äî experience orgasm.

name: Punar gaman bhava

name: Lok mat nirdesh mukt bhava

description: When someone close to you moves away.

name: Siddh vaani maun sawikaar bhava
description: Ability to accept silence or no communication.

name: Shukrana bhav paar bhava
description: For those who are getting out of the aura of saints due to lack of gratitude.

name: Chidakash, param-akash bhava

name: Santaan peera dukh haran bhava

name: Anushashan bhava
audience: for me and some close ones
description: For developing and maintaining discipline.

name: Yagya vidya prasaar bhava

description: The science of Yagya is reignited and spreads.

name: Rin anubandhan mukt bhava
description: Freedom from soul contracts and karmic bindings.

name: Bhav prasaar blessing
description: To communicate through mental signals or intuitive feelings.

name: Asur prabhav nasht bhava
description: Asur (negative energies) are not able to affect us.

name: Asur agyan prabhav nasht bhava
translatedName: Asur support from ignorance ends bhava
description: Asur are not supported by bhagats due to ignorance anymore.

name: Swah sanyiti
description: Established in self so that one does not take actions misaligned with the soul due to external pressures.

name: Parshuram purn yodha Yogasth bhava
description: A complete warrior state like Lord Parshuram, rooted in Yogic stillness and strength.

name: Cancer mukt bhava
description: A state of being free from cancer, physically and energetically.

name: Yatharth swikaar bhava
description: Accepting what life has brought‚Äîpeople or situations‚Äîand spending time with it mindfully.

name: Bhootkal dukhdayi samriti mukt bhava
translatedName: Freedom from painful past memories bhava
description: All painful memories fade away like smoke rising from the spine.

name: Deh naash bhav mukt bhava
translatedName: Freedom from self-destructive body thoughts bhava
description: The body is a divine tool to be used in this world, not to be self-harmed or rejected.

name: Maya khel nirlipt bhava
description: To remain unaffected by the drama of life and not take experiences too seriously.

name: Mansik, baudhik ya sharirik apangta dur bhava
englishName: Mansik, baudhik ya sharirik apangta dur bhava
translatedName: Freedom from mental, intellectual, or physical disabilities bhava
description: A state where all limitations of mind, intellect or body are lifted; also includes freedom from deep suffering.

name: Hanumant veera bhava
description: Invoking the fearless and powerful energy of Lord Hanuman.

name: Har rog bhaav mukt bhava
translatedName: Free from emotions causing sickness bhava
description: Be free from negative emotional states that lead to physical illness.

name: Merudand sajakta bhava
description: Activation and alertness of the spinal channel, symbol of spiritual readiness.

name: Kaam urja moksh dawar bhava
translatedName: Sexual energy transformed toward liberation bhava
description: Transformation of sexual energy into a higher spiritual doorway.

name: Vichar bhava mukt bhava
description: Freedom from the thought construct 'I want this to happen' and surrendering to divine flow.

name: Jealousy mukt bhava
description: State of being free from jealousy, with inner security and contentment.

name: Uphas kratya & unmaad mukt bhava
translatedName: Freedom from obsessive rituals and madness bhava
description: Liberation from obsessive practices, compulsions, or emotional frenzy.

name: Aasjag karam bhava mukt bhava

description: Freedom from actions and karmic residues of earlier incarnations.

name: Shani Sadde-satti mukt bhava

description: Relief from the intense karmic effects of Saturn‚Äôs seven-and-a-half-year cycle.

name: ‡§à‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§®‡•ç‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§®‡§æ bhava
description: Divine soothing and comfort for any kind of weakness‚Äîphysical, mental, or emotional.

name: Upyukt sharir mukt bhava
translatedName: Freedom to leave non-functional body bhava
description: Permission at soul level to release the body when it is no longer useful for life‚Äôs tasks.

name: Tantra ke madhyam se chetna vistar bhava
description: Everyone receives the inner realization that we are consciousness itself, through the medium of Tantra.

name: Charon shariron main chetna behti rahe bhava
englishName: Consciousness flowing in all four bodies
translatedName: Consciousness flows in physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual bodies
description: Continuous conscious flow in all four subtle and gross bodies.

name: Anukampa aashirwad bhava
description: A wave of divine grace and compassion flows into every being.

name: ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§µ ‡§á‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ ‡§≠‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§≠‡§µ‡§æ
englishName: Freedom from desire to relive past emotions
translatedName: The desire to relive a past emotion is dissolved
description: One becomes free from the longing to re-experience emotions or situations from the past.

name: Istraan shradha prakt bhava
description: Devotion and reverence toward the divine feminine awaken within.

name: Istraan purushtav shradha bhav prakt bhava
englishName: Awakening of reverence for divine feminine and masculine
description: A deep reverence arises for both divine feminine and masculine energies.

name: ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∞‡§π jagrat bhava
description: A longing or separation from divine presence awakens inner bhakti and love.

name: Ichha virudh nirudh bhava
translatedName: No one is forced against their will
description: People stop forcing others‚Äîincluding partners or children‚Äîagainst their own will, especially in sexual or emotional matters.

name: Uttarayan daman Bhava
description: When leaving this body, it will be simple, easy and painless

name: Savyam vedna mukt bhava
description: Freedom from self harming behaviour

name: Sahaj gyan bhava
description: Spontaneous bhava

name: Aatam kaam santushti bhava
description: Especially for women

name: Kin kartavaya vimudh bhava
description: Stupidity mukt

name: Munshi bhava
description: May I think myself as an accountant of divine and thus spending on his behalf.

description: Create without the need of being seen bhava

name: Paashvik chetna utthan bhava
description: Accept animality shortcomings bhava

description: Level and duration of pain is reduced

name: ‡§™‡§∞‡§æ‡§ß‡•Ä‡§®‡§§‡§æ pradhinta mukt bhava
description: Majboori se mukti

name: simran bhav-paar bhav
description: Jaap simran deeksha

name: root remember and connected bhava
description: We remember our source

name: Mrityu smaran bhava

name: Dwandh swikaaratmak bhava

name: Nirasha mukt bhava

name: Swayam bhod bhava
description: Self-awakening bhava. The inner light of awareness shines by itself without outside triggers or teachers.

name: Sway swikriti bhava
description: Self-acceptance bhava. We lovingly accept ourselves, including our flaws and gifts, without judgement.

name: Sarv prani chetna utthan bhava
description: A collective rising in consciousness for all beings. The entire creation begins to awaken to divine truth.

name: Jyoti ling mahakaal
description: Blessing of Lord Mahakaal in the jyotirlinga form, so that saints remain protected and untouched by negative forces in these cities.

name: Yogasth emerges as mighty culture
description: Yogasth‚Äîbeing established in yoga‚Äîemerges not just as a practice but as a powerful new way of living and a cultural movement.

name: Svayam prabhavit bhava
description: Remaining unaffected by the ordinary vibrations of others. A state where one's inner peace remains untouched by external influences.

name: Hans drishti bhava

name: Durjan para-vidya dur bhava
description: Let divine wisdom stay away from the wicked. Spiritual knowledge remains protected and inaccessible to those who may misuse it.

name: ‡§™‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§®‡§æ‡§®‡§Ç
description: A sacred inner and outer cleansing. It symbolizes new life, renewal, and spiritual rebirth.

description: Natural celibacy. A state where celibacy arises not from suppression, but from deep understanding and inner contentment.

name: Asatya janjal mukt bhava
